SELECT T1.MATER_NO, ISNULL(T1.MATER_NAME,T1.MATER_NO) MATER_NAME, SUM(1) BIN_COUNT, #where.BTIME# as BTIME, (1+#where.ETIME#) as ETIME FROM WBS_BIN T JOIN WBS_PACKAGE_DATA T1 ON T1.PACKAGE_GUID = T.PACKAGE_GUID JOIN PSB_BIN_STATUS T2 ON T2.BIN_NO = T.BIN_NO WHERE T2.USED_FLAG = 1 AND T2.BIN_STATUS = CHAR(36) AND T2.BIN_BIZ_STATUS = '_'
T1.MATER_NO like '%'+#where.MATER_NO#+'%'
T1.MATER_NAME like '%'+#where.MATER_NAME#+'%'
T1.PRODUCT_DATE >=#where.BTIME#
T1.PRODUCT_DATE <= 1+#where.ETIME#
GROUP BY T1.MATER_NO, T1.MATER_NAME ORDER BY T1.MATER_NO
